Hidden.title: Ambush
Hidden.description: The guard sets up an ambush, waiting silently.

Hidden.title: Recon
Hidden.description: The guard is scouting the area, looking for any intruders.

Hidden.description: The guard keeps watch over a wide area, making sure no one escapes notice.

Hidden.description: The guard avoids direct confrontation, retreating into shadows.
